categories: Category:The Star Wars Sourcebook narrative fiction

nodes.text: There's No Such T'ing as a "Stock" Light Freighter, Boy!

There's No Such T'ing as a "Stock" Light Freighter, Boy! is a short narrative story published in The Star Wars Sourcebook in 1987. Captain Rars Lefken waxes on about the difference between stock light freighters. It was reprinted in the second edition of the book in 1994.
